name: part_014
file: tmp_【#白銀ノエル生誕祭2024】Shirogane Noel Xmas 3D LIVE 【白銀ノエル⧸ホロライブ】 [fTupWAFy6wo]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_014.mov

scenes.description: Shirogane Noel performs the song 'Ours' on a festive, Christmas-themed stage accompanied by giant hamster characters.
The screen fades to black at the end of the live performance.
A commemorative illustration appears with handwritten messages thanking the viewers and promoting a members-only after-live.

subtitles.english: ...in

subtitles.original: 名前を呼んで
subtitles.english: Call my name

subtitles.original: 叶わない願いに胸は痛んで
subtitles.english: My heart aches with a wish that won't come true

subtitles.original: 俯いてしまうけど、
subtitles.english: I end up looking down, but...

subtitles.original: 誰もいない街へ誘いに行くから！
subtitles.english: I'll come to invite you to a town with no one else!

subtitles.original: 今日はこのままさよならじゃないよ。
subtitles.english: Today isn't just going to end with a goodbye.

subtitles.original: 手をとってくれたなら
subtitles.english: If you would take my hand

subtitles.original: 秘密を眠りにつくような夜に
subtitles.english: On a night where secrets fall asleep

subtitles.original: 君を連れていくよ。
subtitles.english: I'll take you away.

subtitles.original: それは例えば遠く離れてたって
subtitles.english: Even if, for example, we were far apart

subtitles.original: 手を繋いでいられるような
subtitles.english: As if we could stay holding hands

subtitles.original: 奇跡のような話をしよう。
subtitles.english: Let's talk of something like a miracle.

subtitles.original: 窓は開けておいて
subtitles.english: Keep the window open

subtitles.original: 聞こえる？
subtitles.english: Can you hear it?

subtitles.original: 愛しいことやなくせないものを
subtitles.english: Dear things and things that can't be lost

subtitles.original: 教えてくれたのは今日みたいな
subtitles.english: What taught me that was a night like today

subtitles.original: 夜を重ねて織り上げてきた
subtitles.english: Woven together through many nights

subtitles.original: 私たちに響く音、
subtitles.english: The sound that resonates within us,

subtitles.original: 響く言葉。
subtitles.english: The words that resonate.

subtitles.original: 見てくれてありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you for watching!

subtitles.original: これからも一緒に誕生日お祝いしてくれるとノエサンタは幸せ太郎です。
subtitles.english: Noe-Santa will be extremely happy if you continue to celebrate my birthday with me.

subtitles.original: 団員さん...ラブち...
subtitles.english: Order members... Love you...

subtitles.original: メン限アフターライブも見てね！
subtitles.english: Check out the members-only after-party live too!
